verses.verse: <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> <S%H2791>secretly<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> out of <S%H7851>Shittim<s%> as <S%H7270>spies,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go,<s%> <S%H7200>view<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> including <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>" They <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H802>house<s%> of a <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7343>Rahab,<s%> and slept <S%H7901>there.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> was <S%H559>told,<s%> <S%H559>"Behold,<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> in here <S%H3915>tonight<s%> to spy <S%H2658>out<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H7343>Rahab,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Bring <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> who have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H935>you,<s%> who have entered into your <S%H1004>house;<s%> for they have <S%H935>come<s%> to spy <S%H2658>out<s%> all the <S%H776>land.<s%>"

The <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> and <S%H6845>hid<s%> <S%H559>them.<s%> Then she said, <S%H582>"Yes,<s%> the men <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3045>me,<s%> but I didn't know where they came <S%H370>from.<s%>

It happened about the time of the <S%H5462>shutting<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> when it was <S%H2822>dark,<s%> that the <S%H582>men<s%> went <S%H3318>out.<s%> Where the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H1980>went,<s%> I <S%H3045>don't<s%> know. <S%H7291>Pursue<s%> <S%H310>them<s%> <S%H4118>quickly;<s%> for you will overtake <S%H5381>them.<s%>"

But she had brought them <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H1406>roof,<s%> and <S%H2934>hid<s%> them with the <S%H6086>stalks<s%> of <S%H6593>flax,<s%> which she had laid in <S%H6186>order<s%> on the <S%H1406>roof.<s%>

The <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>them<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to the <S%H4569>fords:<s%> and as soon as those who <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>them<s%> had gone <S%H3318>out,<s%> they <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>
Before they had laid <S%H7901>down,<s%> she came <S%H5927>up<s%> to them on the <S%H1406>roof;<s%>

and she <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H582>men,<s%> "I <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you the <S%H776>land,<s%> and that the <S%H367>fear<s%> of you has <S%H5307>fallen<s%> on <S%H3427>us,<s%> and that all the inhabitants of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H4127>melt<s%> away before <S%H6440>you.<s%>

For we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> how <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> dried <S%H3001>up<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%> before <S%H6440>you,<s%> when you came <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and what you <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> who were <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> and to <S%H5747>Og,<s%> whom you utterly <S%H2763>destroyed.<s%>

As soon as we had <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3824>it,<s%> our hearts <S%H4549>melted,<s%> neither did there <S%H6965>remain<s%> any more <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in any <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H3068>you:<s%> for Yahweh your <S%H430>God,<s%> he is <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4605>above,<s%> and on earth <S%H776>beneath.<s%>

Now <S%H7650>therefore,<s%> please swear to me by <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H3588>since<s%> I have <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H2617>kindly<s%> with <S%H6213>you,<s%> that you also will deal <S%H2617>kindly<s%> with my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> me a <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H226>token;<s%>

and that you will save <S%H2421>alive<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> my <S%H517>mother,<s%> my <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and my <S%H269>sisters,<s%> and all that they <S%H5337>have,<s%> and will deliver our <S%H5315>lives<s%> from <S%H4194>death.<s%>"

The <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5315>her,<s%> "Our life for <S%H4191>yours,<s%> if you <S%H5046>don't<s%> talk about this <S%H1697>business<s%> of <S%H3068>ours;<s%> and it shall be, when Yahweh <S%H5414>gives<s%> us the <S%H776>land,<s%> that we will <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H2617>kindly<s%> and truly with <S%H571>you.<s%>"

Then she let them <S%H3381>down<s%> by a <S%H2256>cord<s%> <S%H1157>through<s%> the <S%H2474>window;<s%> for her <S%H1004>house<s%> was on the <S%H7023>side<s%> of the <S%H2346>wall,<s%> and she <S%H3427>lived<s%> on the <S%H2346>wall.<s%>

She <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>them,<s%> "Go to the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> lest the <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> <S%H6293>find<s%> <S%H2247>you;<s%> and hide yourselves there <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> until the <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> have <S%H7725>returned.<s%> <S%H310>Afterward,<s%> you may <S%H3212>go<s%> your <S%H1870>way.<s%>"
The <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5355>her,<s%> "We will be guiltless of this your <S%H7621>oath<s%> which you have made us to <S%H7650>swear.<s%>

<S%H935>Behold,<s%> when we come into the <S%H776>land,<s%> you shall <S%H7194>bind<s%> this <S%H8615>line<s%> of <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H2339>thread<s%> in the <S%H2474>window<s%> <S%H3381>which<s%> you used to let us <S%H622>down.<s%> You shall gather to yourself into the <S%H1004>house<s%> your <S%H1>father,<s%> your <S%H517>mother,<s%> your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and all your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>household.<s%>

It shall be that <S%H834>whoever<s%> goes <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of your <S%H1004>house<s%> into the <S%H2351>street,<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> will be on his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and we will be <S%H5355>guiltless.<s%> Whoever is with you in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be on our <S%H7218>head,<s%> if any hand is on <S%H3027>him.<s%>
But if you <S%H5046>talk<s%> about this <S%H1697>business<s%> of <S%H5355>ours,<s%> then we shall be guiltless of your <S%H7621>oath<s%> which you have made us to <S%H7650>swear.<s%>"

She <S%H559>said,<s%> "According to your <S%H1697>words,<s%> so be <S%H7971>it.<s%>" She sent them away, and they <S%H3212>departed.<s%> She <S%H7194>tied<s%> the <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H8615>line<s%> in the <S%H2474>window.<s%>

They <S%H3212>went,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and <S%H3427>stayed<s%> there <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> until the <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> had <S%H7725>returned.<s%> The <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> them throughout all the <S%H1870>way,<s%> but <S%H4672>didn't<s%> find them.

Then the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7725>returned,<s%> <S%H3381>descended<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> passed <S%H5674>over,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun;<s%> and they <S%H5608>told<s%> him all that had happened to <S%H4672>them.<s%>

They <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H3588>"Truly<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into our <S%H3027>hands<s%> all the <S%H776>land.<s%> <S%H3427>Moreover,<s%> all the inhabitants of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H4127>melt<s%> away before <S%H6440>us.<s%>"
